content: this legal document provides information about a settlement act between mr owpon and mrs born who have decided to proceed with a divorce by mutual consent they have made agreements regarding various aspects of their separation including the division of property bank balances and social rights they have renounced certain inheritance rights and agreed not to seek maintenance from each other the divorce proceedings will be filed in a dutchspeaking family court and the costs and allocation of immovable property will be shared equally between the parties the parties have provided a domicile address for contact during the proceedings and a notary has certified their marital status based on the national register the parties have acknowledged the possibility of conflicts of interest and their right to choose another notary or have legal counsel present the document is duly noted and signed by all parties involved and a certified copy is made
